title: Gus and Citty at the Binger's Pool, Wayzata, plate 23 from, "Fun, Friends, and Relatives"
description: woman with long hair at center of image, standing in profile with her pants pulled down below her buttocks; man at left with long dark hair and moustache, wearing dark pants and striped short-sleeved shirt; swimming pool in foreground in a yard with house at right; sculptures in LLC at edge of pool and at left behind man
